sn48.50:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā aṅgesu viharati āpaṇaṁ nāma aṅgānaṁ nigamo.
sn48.50:1.3: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
sn48.50:1.4: “yo so, sāriputta, ariyasāvako tathāgate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā”ti?
sn48.50:2.1: “Yo so, bhante, ariyasāvako tathāgate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā.
sn48.50:2.2: saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ yaṁ āraddhavīriyo viharissati—akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
sn48.50:2.3: Yaṁ hissa, bhante, vīriyaṁ tadassa vīriyindriyaṁ.
sn48.50:3.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ yaṁ satimā bhavissati, paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā.
sn48.50:3.2: Yā hissa, bhante, sati tadassa satindriyaṁ.
sn48.50:4.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa upaṭṭhitassatino etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ yaṁ vossaggārammaṇaṁ karitvā labhissati samādhiṁ, labhissati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
sn48.50:4.2: Yo hissa, bhante, samādhi tadassa samādhindriyaṁ.
sn48.50:5.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa upaṭṭhitassatino samāhitacittassa etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ yaṁ evaṁ pajānissati—
sn48.50:5.3: Pubbakoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
sn48.50:5.4: Avijjāya tveva tamokāyassa asesavirāganirodho santametaṁ padaṁ paṇītametaṁ padaṁ, yadidaṁ—
sn48.50:5.5: sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
sn48.50:5.6: Yā hissa, bhante, paññā tadassa paññindriyaṁ.
sn48.50:6.1: Saddho so, bhante, ariyasāvako evaṁ padahitvā padahitvā evaṁ saritvā saritvā evaṁ samādahitvā samādahitvā evaṁ pajānitvā pajānitvā evaṁ abhisaddahati:
sn48.50:6.2: ‘ime kho te dhammā ye me pubbe sutavā ahesuṁ.
sn48.50:6.3: Tenāhaṁ etarahi kāyena ca phusitvā viharāmi, paññāya ca ativijjha passāmī’ti.
sn48.50:6.4: Yā hissa, bhante, saddhā tadassa saddhindriyan”ti.
